an5.47:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an5.47:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an5.47:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an5.47:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako bahussuto hoti …pe… ditthiya suppatividdho.
an5.47:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vosaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato.
an5.47:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pannava hoti, udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
